comments.raw_text: When the requestee field appears or disappears the rest of the page shifts down or up to accommodate the change in height. This is with the classic skin; I don't know whether the problem affects the dusk skin.
comments.text: When the requestee field appears or disappears the rest of the page shifts down or up to accommodate the change in height. This is with the classic skin; I don't know whether the problem affects the dusk skin.
By comparison, the requestee fields in the Splinter review work differently and they don't appear to suffer from this problem.

comments.text:
this was caused by bug 179626

the problem is the heights of the two controls (combobox and textedit) are different, resulting in a shift when the textedit control is displayed because it is slightly taller.

> I don't know whether the problem affects the dusk skin.

it does.

> the requestee fields in the Splinter review [doesn't] appear to
> suffer from this problem.

i see this problem on the splinter review flags too (it runs the exact same code to generate the flags).
